Content.Summary: During this period, the undersigned searched 28 journals for references on tobacco, food, and special subjects. A breakdown of references turned up and percentages is attached at the end. Duplicate entries from the same compound and check the current add live on tobacco and smoke constituents should be assigned the proper CA manufacturer to the individual compounds and file the others.
Content.Sr. W. Rice: Searched CA subject indexes and other sources for toxicity data on a number of compounds isolated from tobacco.

Translating Literature.Jr. T. Perfelli: Translated a German paper on the reaction of amino acids with nicotine, by I. S. Jaichni Kor in Biochem. Zeitschrift. 245, 506-28 (1933)

Content.Translation: Several German papers on tobacco and health
